resources.string: Everyone has a unique tongue print, just like fingerprints.
Light doesn’t necessarily travel at the speed of light. The slowest we’ve ever recorded light moving at is 38 mph.
The top of the Eiffel Tower leans away from the sun, as the metal facing the sun heats up and expands. It can move as much as seven inches.
The only number whose letters are in alphabetical order is 40 (f-o-r-t-y).
Hewlett Packard, Microsoft, as well as Apple have one not so obvious thing in common – they were all started in a garage.
Every minute, 100 hours of video are uploaded on YouTube by individual users.
There are 350 million Snapchat messages sent every day.
Skype is banned from the public in China.
Pac Man was invented by the designer Toru Iwatani while he was eating pizza.
In the original arcade version of Donkey Kong, Mario was called jump man and he was carpenter not plumber.
